DVSCardAlreadyUsedException Class Reference

Attempt to instantiate a DVSCard object when one already exists for that card number This exception is thrown during the instantiation of a new DVSCard object. More...

#include <DVSClasses.h>

Inheritance diagram for DVSCardAlreadyUsedException::


Public Methods

 DVSCardAlreadyUsedException (const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
 DVSCardAlreadyUsedException (const DVSCardAlreadyUsedException &e) throw ()

Detailed Description

Attempt to instantiate a DVSCard object when one already exists for that card number This exception is thrown during the instantiation of a new DVSCard object.

Only one can exist for a given dvs board in the computer.

Parameters:
context   Information on the context in which this exception is occurring - eg. the function call that caused it. NULL if no context string is required
e   The causal parent exception of this one being instantiated. See DVSException::DVSException()
